DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: You should be used to it by now.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I’ve come to collect the claws, do you have them?

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: You turned out to be weaker than my creations.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: But I have another way to test your resilience.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: If you survive my strike, I’ll gift you the seeds of a beautiful plant.
